sentences.text: Director Nominations for Inclusion in Starbucks Proxy Materials (Proxy Access)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We recently amended Starbucks bylaws to permit a shareholder, or a group of up to 20 shareholders, owning at least 3% of the Companys outstanding shares of common stock continuously for at least three years, to nominate and include in our annual meeting proxy materials director nominees constituting up to the greater of two nominees or 20% of the board, subject to the requirements specified in our bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of proxy access director nominees must be delivered to the corporate secretary at our executive offices no earlier than August 30, 2017, and no later than September 29, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Starbucks Corporation 2017 Proxy Statement 61
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SHAREHOLDERS SHARING THE SAME ADDRESS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have adopted a procedure called householding, which has been approved by the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this procedure, we will deliver only one copy of our Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials, and for those shareholders that received a paper copy of proxy materials in the mail, one copy of our fiscal 2016 annual report on Form 10-K to shareholders and this proxy statement, to multiple shareholders who share the same address (if they appear to be members of the same family) unless we have received contrary instructions from an affected shareholder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders who participate in householding will continue to receive separate proxy cards if they received a paper copy of proxy materials in the mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This procedure reduces our printing costs, mailing costs and fees, and also supports our environmental goals set forth in our annual report on Global Responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a shareholder, share an address and last name with one or more other shareholders and would like to revoke your householding consent or you are a shareholder eligible for householding and would like to participate in householding, please contact Broadridge, either by calling toll free at (866) 540-7095 or by writing to Broadridge, Householding Department, 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood, New York 11717.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will be removed from the householding program within 30 days of receipt of the revocation of your consent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A number of brokerage firms have instituted householding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares in street name, please contact your bank, broker or other holder of record to request information about householding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Admission Requirements: As noted in this document, to be admitted to the meeting you will be required to present a government-issued photo identification (such as a drivers license or passport) and valid proof of ownership, meaning one of the following.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accessibility: Starbucks is committed to providing an accessible experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The event will be interpreted in American Sign Language and real-time captioning will be provided in the auditorium.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Complimentary assistive listening devices and wheelchairs will be available.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: McCaw Hall is an accessible building with wheelchair seating, disability parking and accessible restrooms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have a disability accommodation request, please contact us at (206) 318-7118 or email investorrelations@starbucks.com by March 1, 2017.

sentences.text: How to Vote:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend the Annual Meeting, we urge you to vote and submit your proxy in advance of the meeting by one of the methods below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Make sure to have your proxy card or voting instruction form (VIF) in hand.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Internet: go to www.proxyvote.com;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By toll-free telephone: call 1-800-690-6903; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By mail (if you received a paper copy of the proxy materials by mail): mark, sign, date and promptly mail the enclosed proxy card in the postage-paid envelope.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders may also vote in person at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered shareholder (that is, you hold your shares in your name), you must present valid identification to vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a beneficial shareholder (that is, your shares are held in the name of a broker, bank or other holder of record), you will also need to obtain a legal proxy from the holder of record to vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
